name: bonded-app
description: Relationship verification app for immigration success. Privacy-first. AI runs fully in-browser. Storage on ICP blockchain.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd src/bonded-app-frontend && npm install
scripts.test:backend: dfx canister call bonded-app-backend greet '("ICP Backend")'
scripts.dev: npm run start:local && npm run deploy:local && cd src/bonded-app-frontend && npm run start
scripts.clean: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx && rm -rf src/bonded-app-frontend/dist && rm -rf target
